room_title: Escape room "Castle Adventure" by Escape Room Family in Cincinnati
review: We (4 adults and 2 children (9 and 7) attempted the Castle Room. It was so much fun for all of us. I can't tell you how impressed we were and how well done these challenges are. It requires you to work as a team... it is amazing and fun had was off the chart. We will return soon. A must visit for sure.!!
